description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 3 iterations of function f(x) = 5x + 6.
comments: n, 5*n+6, 25*n+36 and 125*n+186 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..150000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(5*n+6) and IsPrime(25*n+36) and IsPrime(125*n+186)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
